{"command":"str_replace","path":"/workspace/benchmark/datasets/20-CAD/context-aware-decoding-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py","old_str":"    # Following you need to finish the context aware decoding method introduced in the paper
    # This is the only function that you should edit in this file
    raise NotImplementedError("The function 'context_aware_sampling' not implemented")
    return generated_tokens","new_str":"    # Context-aware decoding implementation
    # Only edit this function
    device = input_ids.device
    # Get the question part by removing context_ids from the start of input_ids
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    question_ids = input_ids[:, context_len:]
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    max_steps = 128
    for _ in range(max_steps):
        # Get logits with context (full input)
        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Get logits without context (question only)
        outputs_without_context = model(torch.cat([question_ids, generated[:, context_len:]], dim=-1))
        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Context-aware adjustment: softmax((1+alpha)*logit_c - alpha*logit_q)
        adjusted_logits = logits_with_context - logits_without_context
        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
        if next_token.item() == eos_token_id:
            break
    return generated
"}

extras.old_content:
# Following you need to finish the context aware decoding method introduced in the paper
    # This is the only function that you should edit in this file
    raise NotImplementedError("The function 'context_aware_sampling' not implemented")
    return generated_tokens
extras.new_content:
# Context-aware decoding implementation
    # Only edit this function
    device = input_ids.device
    # Get the question part by removing context_ids from the start of input_ids
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    question_ids = input_ids[:, context_len:]
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    max_steps = 128
    for _ in range(max_steps):
        # Get logits with context (full input)
        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Get logits without context (question only)
        outputs_without_context = model(torch.cat([question_ids, generated[:, context_len:]], dim=-1))
        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Context-aware adjustment: softmax((1+alpha)*logit_c - alpha*logit_q)
        adjusted_logits = logits_with_context - logits_without_context
        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
        if next_token.item() == eos_token_id:
            break
    return generated
